title: Thomas Stone National Historic Site: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           6655 Rose Hill Road  Port Tobacco, MD 20677                 Directions         Thomas Stone NHS is located on Rose Hill Road, between Maryland state routes 225 and 6, four miles west of LaPlata, MD.   Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Park Operating Hours Thomas Stone NHS is open from March to December every year and is closed in January and February. During the week, Thomas Stone is open Thursdays-Sundays from 10:00-4:00 and is closed Mondays-Wednesdays.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM   Monday: Closed   Tuesday: Closed   Wednesday: Closed   Thursday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM   Friday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM   Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM             Weather           Temperatures can be very warm and humid in the summer months and wet and cold in the winter months.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   No Entrance Fee - $0.00 No Entrance Fee         Visitor Centers              Â      NPS  Welcome to the website for the only national park created solely for a Signer of the Declaration of Independence and one of four signers homes protected as national parks. The park is situated in historic Southern Maryland, within an easy drive from our nation's capital. Besides Washington D.C. the first capital of Maryland in St. Mary's City is just a short drive to the southeast and the current capital, Annapolis, is just a short drive northeast. Come walk the grounds, tour the restored mansion, and learn about how this ordinary gentlemen played an extraordinary part in the founding of the United States. The following pages on this website will get you oriented to the site so you can safely make the most out of your time with us.
